name: Mike Broadwater
title: Senior Project Manager
about:
I am passionate about taking good ideas and turning them into something great. During my career I have been a programmer, QA tester, technical writer, designer, and have even done sales. This background has been incredibly helpful to me as a Project Manager. It allows me to speak to developers, designers, clients, and other members of my teams in ways we can both understand.

When I'm not helping our clients bring their ideas to life I spend a lot of time with my wife, our two kids, our dogs and a very aloof cat. I can recite "Brown Bear, Brown Bear" from memory. I use any leftover time being a huge nerd and organizing my collection of board games, pen and paper role playing games, video games and Lego. And yes, the plural of "Lego" is "Lego". Occasionally I work out by shooting archery or practicing Krav Maga.
